meanings.definition: The act of shooting with great accuracy or precision.
meanings.sent1: Her sharpshooting impressed everyone at the competition.
meanings.sent2: The sharpshooting of the archer never failed to hit the target.
meanings.sent3: The sharpshooting contest was intense but fun for all participants.
meanings.sent4: His sharpshooting skills were like a laser beam, hitting every mark effortlessly.
meanings.sent5: The sharpshooting display under the bright lights was mesmerizing.

meanings.definition: A person skilled in shooting accurately.
meanings.sent1: The sharpshooting champion received a gold medal.
meanings.sent2: The sharpshooting instructor taught the students how to aim precisely.
meanings.sent3: The sharpshooting expert never missed a bullseye, even blindfolded!
meanings.sent4: She was a sharpshooting star in the world of marksmanship.
meanings.sent5: His sharpshooting abilities were legendary among his peers.
